description: INVITATION TO QUALIFY – JC VAN HORNE BRIDGE – CLEANING 2023, TWO (2) PHASE SELECTION PROCESS: THE FIRST PHASE WILL EVALUATE THE QUALIFICATIONS OF ALL INTERESTED SUPPLIERS; THE SECOND PHASE WILL INVITE THE QUALIFIED SUPPLIERS TO PROVIDE A FINANCIAL BID ON THE PROJECT BASED ON THE SPECIFICATIONS AND DRAWINGS.
tags: Service type: Structural exterior cleaning services
full_summary:
**Invitation to Qualify: JC Van Horne Bridge Cleaning 2023**

**Reference Number:** WS4058233923 - Doc4058351089

**Publication Date:** June 16, 2023

**Closing Date for Tenders:** July 6, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time

**Invitation Type:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify

**Procurement Category:** CNST (Construction and Maintenance Services,Trade)

**Object of the Procurement:** The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting interest from qualified suppliers for the provision of structural exterior cleaning services for the JC Van Horne Bridge.

**Background Information:** This two-phase process involves the evaluation of qualifications for interested suppliers, followed by a financial bid on the project for qualified suppliers. The qualification list will expire within 60 days or upon award of a contract.

**Latest Update (if any)**

The tender submission process is ongoing, and interested suppliers are invited to submit their qualification documents. It is essential to review the submission guidelines and the solicitation document to ensure your company meets the requirements.

**Submission Guidelines:**

* Submit your qualification package to Ariba Enterprises Inc. via the provided online platform.
* Ensure you have the required documents, including proof of liability insurance and ISNetworld certification.

**Required Documents:**

* Proof of liability insurance
* ISNetworld certification
* Company profile
* Business registration
* Other relevant certifications (if applicable)

**Potential Contract Terms:**

* The contract period may extend beyond the initial 60 days.
* The contract may involve working on site at the JC Van Horne Bridge.
* Suppliers must comply with all regulatory requirements and signage safety policies.

**Contact Information:**

* Sonia Stockman, PSPC/SPAC
* Email: [sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Solicitation Documents:**

Available on Ariba Enterprises Inc. [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16607020?extsite=MTY2MDcwMjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16607020?extsite=MTY2MDcwMjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) or
